card.name: [OP] Eustass"Captain"Kid [OP01-051]
card.text: [DON!! x1] [Opponent's Turn] If this Character is rested, your opponent cannot attack any card other than the Character [Eustass"Captain"Kid]. [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] You may rest this Character: Play up to 1 Character card with a cost of 3 or less from your hand.

card.name: [OP] Portgas.D.Ace [OP03-001]
card.text: When this Leader attacks or is attacked, you may trash any number of Event or Stage cards from your hand. This Leader gains +1000 power during this battle for every card trashed.

card.name: [OP] Adio [OP03-002]
card.text: [DON!! x1] [When Attacking] Your opponent cannot activate a [Blocker] Character that has 2000 or less power during this battle.

card.name: [OP] Izo [OP03-003]
card.text: [On Play] Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 card with a type including "Whitebeard Pirates" other than [Izo] and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.name: [OP] Curiel [OP03-004]
card.text: This Character cannot attack a Leader on the turn in which it is played. [DON!! x1] This Character gains [Rush]. (This card can attack on the turn in which it is played.)

card.name: [OP] Thatch [OP03-005]
card.text: [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] This Character gains +2000 power during this turn. Then, trash this Character at the end of this turn.

card.name: [OP] Buggy [OP03-008]
card.text: This Character cannot be K.O.'d in battle by attribute cards. [On Play] Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 red Event and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.name: [OP] Haruta [OP03-009]
card.text: [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] Give up to 1 rested DON!! card to your Leader or 1 of your Characters.

card.name: [OP] Fossa [OP03-010]
card.text: [Blocker] (After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.)

card.text: [DON!! x1] [When Attacking] Give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters −2000 power during this turn.

card.name: [OP] Marshall.D.Teach [OP03-012]
card.text: [When Attacking] You may trash 1 of your red Characters with 4000 power or more: Draw 1 card. Then, this Character gains +1000 power during this battle.

card.name: [OP] Marco [OP03-013]
card.text: [Your Turn] [On Play] K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with 3000 power or less. [On K.O.] You may trash 1 Event from your hand: You may play this Character card from your trash rested.

card.text: [When Attacking] Play up to 1 red Character card with a cost of 1 from your hand.

card.text: [Blocker] (After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.) [Opponent's Turn] When this Character is K.O.'d, give up to 1 of your opponent's Leader or Character cards −2000 power during this turn.

card.name: [OP] Cross Fire [OP03-017]
card.text: [Main]/[Counter] If your Leader's type includes "Whitebeard Pirates", give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters −4000 power during this turn. [Trigger] Activate this card's [Main] effect.

card.text: [Main] You may trash 1 Event from your hand: K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with 5000 power or less and up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with 4000 power or less. [Trigger] K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with 5000 power or less.

card.name: [OP] Fiery Doll [OP03-019]
card.text: [Main] Your Leader gains +4000 power during this turn. [Trigger] Give up to 1 of your opponent's Leader or Character cards −10000 power during this turn.

card.text: [Activate: Main] ② (You may rest the specified number of DON!! cards in your cost area.) You may rest this Stage: If your Leader is [Portgas.D.Ace], look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 Event and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
